methodology.notes: Scores were achieved using extended thinking with tool use and a prompt addendum to the Airline and Telecom Agent Policy instructing Claude to better target its known failure modes when using the vanilla prompt. A prompt addendum was also added to the Telecom User prompt to avoid failure modes from the user ending the interaction incorrectly.

verification.details: Unverified submission - no trajectory data available, unknown evaluation methodology, telecom domain omitted, incomplete evaluation (Pass^1 only)
